scripts.migrate: cd database && docker-compose up -d && cd ../api && yarn db migration:run && cd ..
scripts.dev: yarn && yarn migrate && concurrently -k "cd api && yarn build:watch" "cd api && yarn dev"
scripts.test: yarn migrate && concurrently -k "cd api && yarn test" "cd common && yarn test" "cd data && yarn test" "cd web && yarn test"
scripts.test:cov: yarn migrate && concurrently -k "cd api && yarn test:cov"
scripts.postinstall: (husky install && husky set .husky/pre-commit "cd api && yarn lint-staged") || exit 0
